page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: { FRI. 7.30a.m.}I get out of bed and change into my school uniform. I go downstairs and get my breakfast of cornflakes. I then watch T.V. until 8o'clock. {8.00a.m.}I go to the bathroom and have a wash and brush my teeth. Then afterwards I gather all my school books in my bag. { 8.25a.m.}I call for a friend and then we bike to school down Hawton Lane and London Road. {8.50a.m.}I register in my tutor base and go to the school assembly in the sports hall at 9.15a.m. we leave for the first lesson. {9.15a.m.}We have English for one lesson and then we have a Library lesson. {10.30a.m.}We have break and at 10.50a.m. it is back to lessons.
